mapper.select: select max(dayId)+1 from memberPromotion where createTime >= #{today}
mapper.insert: insert into memberPromotion(dayId, createTime, lastModifiedTime, beginTime, endTime, comment, requiredLevel, discountFraction, tokenAmount) values(#{dayId}, #{createTime}, #{lastModifiedTime}, #{beginTime}, #{endTime}, #{comment}, #{requiredLevel}, #{discountFraction}, #{tokenAmount})
mapper.update: update memberPromotion set lastModifiedTime=#{lastModifiedTime}, beginTime=#{beginTime}, endTime=#{endTime}, comment=#{comment}, requiredLevel=#{requiredLevel}, discountFraction=#{discountFraction}, tokenAmount=#{tokenAmount} where dayId=#{dayId} and createTime=#{createTime}
mapper.delete: delete from memberPromotion where dayId=#{dayId} and createTime=#{createTime}
mapper.select: select * from memberPromotion where beginTime <= #{begin} and endTime >= #{end}
